title: Physics of Planets
description: In this course we will study the forces and influences that determine the composition, structure and evolution of the planets in our solar system.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: PHYS 2212 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and (MATH 2403 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 2413 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 24X3 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T or MATH 2552 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 2562 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 2X52 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T)
